item.title: Install WeChat on Fedora
item.description: Install WeChat on Fedora Install Wine sudo dnf install wine Adjust DPI Config Use bellow command to open winecfg winecfg Adjust the dpi to a suitable value at tab Graphics. (4k monitor, 192 dpi) Download And Config Fonts Run the following commands sudo dnf install cabextract sudo dnf install winetricks winetricks corefonts gdiplus riched20 riched30 Download & Install WeChat Just download the exe Installer. (Same with download it from browser.)
